title: FireSmart Zone Scheduling System - Phase 1 Data Analysis
description: Build zone-based scheduling system for FireSmart 2026 season. BLOCKED on: (1) User timeline decision (A/B/C/D), (2) MS List export of Strata workday data, (3) Crew capacity info. Once data received, will build Excel master schedule + Python analysis tools.
notes: Directory structure created. User clarifications received: (1) Strata workdays booked opportunistically not as fixed anchors, (2) Ops plan is user's not Andy's. Need to adjust approach to be more flexible/guidance-based rather than strict scheduling.
